# The `ConstantIntOrdering` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class implements a stable ordering of constant integers that does not depend on their address. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class implements a stable ordering of constant integers that does not depend on their address.

This is important for applications that sort <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a>&#39;s to ensure uniqueness.

Definition at line 1059 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifycfg-cpp">SimplifyCFG.cpp</a>.
